subject: Re: Shaw Alphabet Books is now online.
msgSnippet: ... Well, I m not sure what s going on, but I do find it interesting that the public and private messages you sent were different. The public message had a 43
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, Michael Everson <everson@...> wrote:

> A feature, not a bug? Anyway I find it pretty illegible.

Well, I'm not sure what's going on, but I do find it interesting that the public and private messages you sent were different. The public message had a 43 byte GIF file called space.gif. If you check the source code for my page, you'll see NO reference to a "space.gif" file anywhere or any GIFs of any kind. There's also no Javascript, classes, stylesheets, or anything above HTML 1.0 in the code, maybe HTML 2.0 depending on when the FONT tag was added, so there's no way for me to have hidden it. Privately, you sent me a 222K picture called download.png, which is in the files section now. It all seems OK to me...

> And see no Shavian.

Very true. Given all the last minute problems I've been having with the book text, I haven't had a chance to work on any Shavian pages yet, but they are forthcoming. I also intend to upload book previews soon so that people have a chance to "look inside" before they buy.
